content.query:
SELECT 
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborId') As LaborId, 
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.submittedFor') AS SubmittedFor, 
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborDate') AS LaborDate,
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborHours') AS LaborHours,
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborCategoryId') AS LaborCategoryId, 
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborTimeZoneId') AS LaborTimeZoneId,
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.approvalDetails.actualApprover') AS ActualApprover,
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.assignmentDetails.assignmentName') AS AssignmentName,
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.assignmentDetails.customerName') AS CustomerName,
JSON_Value(Labor,'$.partner') AS Partner

FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB',
'Account=lmt-cdba-core-uat-eastus;Database=lmt-cdb-core-uat;Key=VUqk2TMCpUPAF78eLyN6sJLuEGMEGDJ64pAtcRt0RijltkrDji7mQevxAMWSLl4sw7beHfpskGz7mMQOJtceTQ==',
LaborTransactionAudit) AS LaborTransactionAudit

WHERE JSON_Value(Labor,'$.actionDetails[0].actionType') = N'LateSubmission'
OR    JSON_Value(Labor,'$.actionDetails[1].actionType') = N'LateSubmission'
OR    JSON_Value(Labor,'$.actionDetails[2].actionType') = N'LateSubmission'
